author: rooneg
msg: update to account for svn log's new --incremental argument.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/Makefile : Switch to using rpmbuild rather than rpm as
RedHat 8.0 can't build with "rpm" and RedHat 7.X has rpmbuild.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Fixed bug where I was using an old directory
that hadn't been cleaned out correctly.

author: sussman
msg: Fix potential segfault in new 'prop* -r' functions.  Thanks to Philip
doesn't accidentally deref a NULL entry.  :-)

author: cmpilato
msg: No longer do the SVN: prefix thing for $EDITOR.  Instead, we have
magic token that, so longer as it remains at the beginning of the
line, will be removed, *and* everything after it is ignored, too.
